name: Spectroid
description:
Spectroid is a project I did while in school. A team of students and I took heavy inspiration from Galaga and Ikaruga and came up with this in about two weeks. It's very obviously still a prototype (I mean... the debug messages are still visible...), which means the gameplay is incredibly short. I hope to update the point system to work more like a traditional arcade game as soon as I have time. So, patches to come!

Thanks for playing!

P.S.  Exit the game using the ESC key.
